Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

Docs.param: 指定更改事件（例如，针对整个多文档序列、单个文档或单页的事件）的进度范围的枚举值。
已写入的文档数或页数，取决于 定义的范围。
已写入的数据的百分比。
标识写操作的用户提供的对象。
Docs.summary: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户提供的 `state` 参数是传递给用于 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync%2A> 标识异步写入操作的方法的对象。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Number As Integer
public: property int Number { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

Docs.summary: 获取已写入的文档数或页数。
Docs.value: 在事件发生时已写入的文档数或页数。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A> 属性为时 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel.FixedDocumentSequenceWritingProgress> ， <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A> 指定已写入的文档数。 对于所有其他 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A> 情况， <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A> 是已写入的页数。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WritingLevel As WritingProgressChangeLevel

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

Docs.summary: 获取一个值，该值指示写入进度的范围。
Docs.value: 指定写入多文档序列、单个文档或单页的范围的枚举。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A> 属性为时 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel.FixedDocumentSequenceWritingProgress> ， <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A> 属性指定已写入的文档数。 对于所有其他 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A> 情况， <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A> 属性为已写入的页数。
